about_the_game:
From the developers of nothingyouhavehearbefore, a spooky visual novel played in 3D.

Features

  • A linear narrative... - go to school, fail your exams, decide to heist the school and then ????

  • ...with hundreds of little choices! - talk to people and understand their beef with each other. Gossip. Gather intel. Do things early on and see their repercussions way later.  

  • 3D exploration & visual novel hybrid - walk, run, sneak around, open containers in 3D. Every interaction appears in hand-drawn comic book panels.

  • Investigate the mystery - ask around and read everything you can to understand why people have disappeared over the years in Noirmont High.

  • Not a dating sim... or? - maybe a bit

  • Cinematic mise-en-scène - fully animated 3D cutscenes for the major beats, blend of fixed camera and following camera.

  • Nostalgic soundtrack & visuals  - a good old 80s vibe in this game.

Find your way around campus. Explore, collect useful tools and try to remember how to navigate the rooms. You might need it.

Chat with Noirmont students, remember the smallest details from their gossip and use it against others.

You cannot be everyone's friend.

The important thing is that you do your best <3

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of the protagonist's anxiety disorder in an allegorical form, appearing as gory violent deaths whenever they experience panic attacks. Deaths are not real in-world, but very graphic and meant to be impactful. Drugs and tobacco use occurs mostly off-screen and is mentioned by supporting characters.
